SELECT a.*, b.com_name AS com_no FROM recruit AS a LEFT JOIN company AS b ON a.com_no = b.com_no WHERE a.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') or a.career LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search} '%') OR a.skill LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{search}, '%') OR a.field LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search},'%') or b.com_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
SELECT a.*, b.com_name from recruit AS a LEFT JOIN company AS b ON a.com_no = b.com_no ORDER BY reg_date
SELECT a.*, b.com_name FROM recruit AS a LEFT JOIN company AS b ON a.com_no = b.com_no WHERE deadline_date >= CURDATE() ORDER BY deadline_date
